summary: The U.S. belongs to several multilateral organizations of North and South American countries, the largest of which is the Organization of American States. In a report on which this testimony is based, we found that the U.S. paid over 57% of total assessed contributions for these organizations between 2014 and 2016. The State Department is working with OAS to reform its fee structure so that...
title: Inter-American Organizations: U.S. Share of Assessed Contributions and U.S. Agencies' Efforts to Monitor Assistance Agreements
